input_data: {{PROJECT_PATH}} - Root directory of the Dental Dashboard project {{ASSESSMENT_TYPE}} - Full assessment or specific area (git|code|tests|deps|db|build|docs) {{PREVIOUS_SCORES}} - Optional: Previous health check scores for trend analysis
immediate_task: Execute comprehensive health assessment for the Dental Dashboard project located at {{PROJECT_PATH}}. Run the specified commands for each assessment area, analyze the outputs, calculate health scores, and generate a complete health dashboard with actionable recommendations.

precognition.step1: Analyze the project structure and identify which assessment areas to evaluate based on {{ASSESSMENT_TYPE}}. If full assessment, prepare to execute all seven areas systematically.
precognition.step2: For each assessment area, determine the appropriate commands to run based on the project's tech stack (Next.js 15, TypeScript, Prisma, Biome, etc.).
precognition.step3: Execute commands in order, capturing both successful outputs and any error messages. Parse the results to extract relevant metrics and status information.
precognition.step4: Calculate health scores for each area using the defined criteria, considering factors like error counts, coverage percentages, build success, and integration status.
precognition.step5: Analyze the overall project health, identify trends if previous scores are available, and prioritize recommendations based on impact and urgency.
precognition.step6: Generate the comprehensive health dashboard with visual indicators, scores, metrics, and actionable recommendations formatted for immediate use.
